sentences.en: a line of chimneys belching out smoke
sentences.cn: 喷吐着浓烟的一排烟囱

sentences.en: Abdomen is full go up, belch, distracted how to do?
sentences.cn: 肚子饱涨, 打嗝, 心烦意乱怎么办?

sentences.en: Factories belch forth clouds of smoke.
He drank and stifled a belch.
He let out a belch . The gin was rising from his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他打了个嗝儿——杜松子酒味儿从肚子里漾了起来.

sentences.en: He's making a belch. Give him more clothes to make him warm.
sentences.cn: 你快给他多穿点衣服吧. 他都打嗝了.

sentences.en: It is not proper to belch out so loudly.
sentences.cn: 发出如此大声是不适当的.

sentences.en: It's said drinking some warm water can help get over the belch.
sentences.cn: 有人说打嗝时喝点儿热水就会好的.

sentences.en: Often gastric belch is angry, how is stomach - ache done?
sentences.cn: 经常胃嗝气, 胃疼怎么搞?

sentences.en: Often the person of belch, heartburn belongs to key crowd.
sentences.cn: 经常打嗝 、 烧心的人属于重点人群.

sentences.en: Plant chimneys belch out dense smoke.
sentences.cn: 工厂的烟囱冒出滚滚浓烟.

sentences.en: Suddenly, clouds of steam started to belch from the engine.
sentences.cn: 突然，滚滚蒸汽从发动机里冒了出来。

sentences.en: Tall chimneys belch [ vomit ] forth black smoke.
sentences.cn: 高高的烟囱 喷吐 出黑烟.

sentences.en: The kid is making a belch. Give him a drink.
sentences.cn: 孩子打嗝了, 让他喝口水吧.

sentences.en: What does old belch have to affect to the stomach?
sentences.cn: 老打嗝对胃有什么影响 啊 ?

trans.tran_cn: 打嗝, (火山、炮等)冒烟、喷出
trans.tran_en: to let air from your stomach come out loudly through your mouth

trans.tran_cn: 打嗝，嗳气，喷出，吐出，埋怨，抱怨
打嗝，嗳气，喷射，喷出，态度蛮横地发出（叱咤等）
